ThingDef.label: sleeping spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable. Rest effectiveness: 50%

ThingDef.label: animal sleeping spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.

ThingDef.label: animal sleeping box
ThingDef.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: animal bed
ThingDef.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: stool
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit.

ThingDef.label: dining chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table.

ThingDef.label: armchair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.Name: TableBase
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

ThingDef.label: plant pot
ThingDef.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in red.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in green.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in blue.

ThingDef.label: equipment rack
ThingDef.description: Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: End Table with lamp.
ThingDef.description: A small table with a lamp and a drawer, great beside a bed. Uses 20 watts of power to light a small area.

ThingDef.label: linkable stool
ThingDef.description: People sit here.

ThingDef.label: Couch
ThingDef.Description: Its not making colonist lazy, in theory.

ThingDef.label: Comfy Seat
ThingDef.Description: Old fasion, confy and mostly out of cloth or so they say.

ThingDef.label: Redesigned Stool
ThingDef.Description: Small, durable, handy in bar fights.

ThingDef.label: Round Chair
ThingDef.Description: Modern round chair.

ThingDef.label: hide bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple bed made of wood planks and animal hides. Rest effectiveness: 75%

ThingDef.label: royal bed
ThingDef.Description: A double Bed for one colonist, that's comfy!. Rest effectiveness: 125%

ThingDef.label: hospital bed
ThingDef.Description: A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves chance of successful medical work.

ThingDef.label: cloth bed
ThingDef.Description: A cloth mattress and sheets on a wood frame for resting. Rest effectiveness: 100%

ThingDef.label: comfy bed
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress and animal hides on a metal frame. Pretty comfy! Rest effectiveness: 125%

ThingDef.label: pod bed
ThingDef.Description: A futuristic bed with a high beauty rating. Built to provide the maximum comfort level. Rest effectiveness: 150%

ThingDef.label: guest bed
ThingDef.Description: A place for guests to sleep during their stay.

ThingDef.Name: MatBase
ThingDef.description: A door mat to clean your feet.

ThingDef.description: A ceiling mounted light that lights an area.

ThingDef.description: Wall light that lights an area. Must be placed on a wall.

ThingDef.description: Square floor light integraded into the ground. Waterproof and quite pretty.

ThingDef.description: An outdoor lamp designed to light a large area. It's pretty to look at too.

ThingDef.description: An outdoor lamp designed to light a huge area. It's very pretty to look at too.

ThingDef.label: porch lamp
ThingDef.description: An outdoor lamp designed to light a small area.

ThingDef.label: Path light
ThingDef.description: Small light with built in solar panel that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: Serving Table cooled
ThingDef.Description: Decorative serving table. Keeps food fresh.

ThingDef.label: Locker
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry weapons and apparel here for storage.

ThingDef.description: Steel plated locker design 1. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.description: Steel plated locker design 2. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.description: A contained unit for storing up to 1000 of a single item.

ThingDef.label: Deep Storage Unit Mk.III
